* Main UI logic of the bot.
* Prints a GAP added text for differentiating user and app texts.
* Prints initial greetings when the app starts.
print("I am a chat bot and I'm here to help you be productive :)\n" +
"What can I do for you today?");
* Prints goodbye message before the app ends.
print("Bye. Hope to see you again soon!");
* Main Logic of basic exception for Duke.
* This class is to group Duke related exceptions together.
* A specialised exception for invalid argument.
* This exception occurs when the user input format is invalid but with some known parts.
super("Hmm, I recognized your command but it seems like the arguments are not complete / invalid.");
* A specialised exception for invalid/unknown command.
* This exception occurs when the user input format is unknown.
super("Sorry, I did not recognize your command.");
* A specialised exception for invalid index.
* This exception occurs when user input index is out of bounds.
super("Sorry, your argument has invalid Index. Hint: Use \"list\" command to help you");
